column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday June 14 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd at Southpoint Dr:
column4: Crews are cleaning up a diesel fuel spill following a semi collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd at Southpoint Dr:
column4: The inbound right lane of Nicholasville Rd is blocked.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd at Southpoint Dr:
column4: Southpoint Dr is shutdown completely (entry and exit) until further notice.
